name: WinHKI HKI2 Archive
summary: An HKI2 file is a compressed archive created by WinHKI, an obscure archiving utility for Windows. It likely contains one or more programs or documents, which have been compressed and packaged together for easier storage and sharing. HKI2 files are similar to but compressed differently than .HKI1 and .HKI3 files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
